content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoAre there any good promotions for transferring in new money into SG banks?I have some funds from overseas that I am transferring into Singapore bank account, thanks!1 answerAnswerBump0

Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered 3w agoIf your amount is big enough, about $250,000 (or $300k for some banks) to get you privilege banking, email the banks about promotions.Most of them do not openly advertise on the on-going promotions.
Do choose a bank that you like, for the long term. The promotions of a few extra thousands of dollars may not be justified if you hate the bank.1 comment0
